name: atoma-workspace
description: Atomic state management with universal persistence - built on Jotai and Immer

scripts.build: pnpm --filter atoma-shared run build && pnpm --filter atoma-protocol run build && pnpm --filter atoma-observability run build && pnpm --filter atoma run build && pnpm --filter atoma-backend run build && pnpm --filter atoma-backend-memory run build && pnpm --filter atoma-backend-indexeddb run build && pnpm --filter atoma-sync run build && pnpm --filter atoma-react run build && pnpm --filter atoma-server run build && pnpm --filter atoma-devtools run build
scripts.typecheck: pnpm build && pnpm --filter atoma-shared run typecheck && pnpm --filter atoma-protocol run typecheck && pnpm --filter atoma-observability run typecheck && pnpm --filter atoma run typecheck && pnpm --filter atoma-react run typecheck && pnpm --filter atoma-sync run typecheck && pnpm --filter atoma-backend run typecheck && pnpm --filter atoma-backend-memory run typecheck && pnpm --filter atoma-backend-indexeddb run typecheck && pnpm --filter atoma-server run typecheck && pnpm --filter atoma-devtools run typecheck
scripts.check:sync-alias: bash -lc "if rg -n \"from '#sync/\" packages demo docs tests -g'!packages/atoma-sync/**'; then echo 'ERROR: #sync alias must only be used inside packages/atoma-sync.'; exit 1; fi"
